fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Fire a tear at someone, attacking them.
- (Familiar) Give the lead a Holy Card, guaranteeing a Devil Deal. This ability has a one night cooldown. (2 uses)

fields.name: Attibutes:
fields.value:
- Has Powerful Defense if the lead.
- Has a chance to replace **The Lost (5441)** if it spawns.
- Lose your intrinsic Powerful Defense permanently after being visited by 2 different players throughout the game.
- If you are the lead and lose your Powerful Defense, a non-Basement player visiting you makes you get hit with a Powerful Attack.
Damage: 1 (Basic)
Range: 5
Luck: 30%
